column3: Use WASD to move and mouse to look.$Look down and hold the left mouse button to plant in fertile soil.
Walk up to the door and left click to cryosleep.$This recharges your energy and advances time by a month.
Trees require many plants to be supported.$Otherwise they will wither and die.
Each tree greatly enriches the soil around it, giving you more space to grow.
Right click to delete a plant.
You've unlocked flowers. Press Q/E to switch seeds.$Flowers need to be supported by 10 adjacent grass or they will wither and die.
You've unlocked bushes. Bushes need to be supported by 5 adjacent flowers.
You've unlocked trees! Trees need to be supported by 5 adjacent bushes.$When fully grown, trees will expand the fertile area in which you can plant.
